ygData.subject: Re: Soul Reaver
ygData.msgSnippet: Before anyone says that I am wrong, I would like to point out that what I ve wrote on the Soul Reaver could be false information. I found out that my source
ygData.messageBody:
Before anyone says that I am wrong, I would like to point out that what I've
wrote on the Soul Reaver could be false information. I found out that my
source was not as reliable. Thus, what I heard from him is most likely not
accurate. I did, however, hear it being sold before. But other than that,
the claim that it has the stats of 20/32, Steal Strength and with the
appearance of a mist Fiery Avenger is most likely false.
